name: SARSCoronavirus2RdRpGeneQualitative
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 RdRp Gene, Qualitative
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to qualitative detection of nucleic acids within theRdRp gene of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of nucleic acids within the RdRp gene of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
